name: Gorebyss
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.

ancient_trait.name: α Growth
ancient_trait.effect: When you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon (except with an attack, Ability, or Trainer card), you may attach 2 Energy cards.

attacks.name: Psy Bolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
